news.title: Counter-Strike 2 Update
news.author: Vitaliy
news.contents: \Improved player movement prediction when colliding with other moving players.Added scope in/out sound prediction to play immediately for local player.Retake loadout cards will now randomly offer M4A1-S or M4A4 if player has both equipped in their CT loadout.Added Body Armor to 4v3, 4 Bad Guys Left,...

news.title: Counter-Strike 2 Update
news.author: Vitaliy
news.contents: \Increased matchmaking party size for Retakes to allow 4 players in a party.Fixed a case where players joining Retakes round during freeze time could spawn at a wrong spawn point.Fixed bot manager logic to make room for players by first kicking dead bots and bots who are not controlled by a human.\S...

news.title: Counter-Strike 2 Update
news.author: Vitaliy
news.contents: \Adding Retakes as official game mode supporting Defusal Group Alpha and Defusal Group Delta maps on official matchmaking servers.Fixed Molotov and Smoke interaction logic in cases when multiple smokes are active in the map.\Updated Golden to the latest version from Steam Community Workshop (Update ...

news.title: Re-Retakes

news.contents: {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/3381077/aae1ceb26e12464542579430a2436c8348461b5c.pngThe bomb has been planted and you're running out of time. It's the return of retakes! In this classic game mode, each round drops you in to a fast-paced 4v3 after-plant scenario. Select your loadout card each round, check the map...

news.title: Counter-Strike 2 Update
news.author: Vitaliy
news.contents: \Fixed a case of incorrect damage report data at the end of the rounds.Updated King Crasswater and Queen Ava stickers for clarity.Skinning fixes on Driver Gloves and Sport Gloves.Fixed a crash when playing back some demo files.Stability improvements.

news.title: Dota 2 Update - 10/09/2025
news.author: flynnch
news.contents: Since the 7.39e gameplay patch, we've addressed the following issues:Items on trade cooldown can no longer be listed on the Steam MarketRemoved separate "Market Cooldown" timer from item tooltips as it is no longer relevantFixed people being able to find the server id of non-friends playing matchesF...

news.title: Collector's Cache Voting Open Now
news.author: krAnk0r
news.contents: No matter what else is happening in the world of Dota, the Community Workshop artists never stop dreaming up cool new item sets for all their favorite heroes. Which of course means the workshop is near-to-bursting with game-worthy sets, and — you guessed it by cleverly reading the title above — we'd...

news.contents: Patch 7.39e is out now and you can check out the patch notes here.

news.title: People "talk s**t" to Gabe Newell when he plays Dota 2, but he's okay with it
news.author: editor@pcgamesn.com
news.contents: I consider myself pretty good at MOBAs. While my primary choice will always be League of Legends, I've played (and lost) a few Dota 2 games in my time, piloting heroes like Queen of Pain, Muerta, and Crystal Maiden to somewhat mixed success. Despite the fact that most people believe that Valve has l...

news.title: Apex Legends™: Amped Patch Notes
news.author: respawn_bean
news.contents: AMPED OVERVIEWWe’re starting the hype train for Season 27: Amped, right now, and this is your invitation to get on board! There’s plenty to be excited about this season: major changes to Olympus, Valkyrie retakes the skies, while Rampart and Horizon are getting tune ups, the meta is shifting to clos...

news.title: NEW UPDATES COMING WITH APEX LEGENDS™: AMPED
news.author: respawn_bean
news.contents: Season 27 is upon us, Legends, and it is adrenaline-packed! Chase new heights in an updated Olympus, rebuilt for better flow, dynamic positioning, and elevated gameplay. Check out changes to Valkyrie, Rampart and Horizon that are sure to get your blood pumping. Welcome to the fray, the Double Tap Al...

news.title: Submit your own Apex Legends costume meme
news.author: respawn_bean
news.contents: Happy Halloween, Legends! Use the below costume template with an Apex theme (example also below) and submit your best and most funny ideas for a chance to be featured on our social media! Whether you’re a “Sweaty Wraith Main" or a "Lifeline Who Never Revives" we would love to see what you come up wi...

news.title: Ranked Matchmaking Test - Season 26
news.author: respawn_bean
news.contents: As part of our ongoing efforts to improve matchmaking in Apex Legends, it's time for another round of Ranked matchmaking testing. Starting today, Master players and above can only matchmake with Diamond players and other Masters and Predator players.At the end of the previous season, our test of lim...

news.title: Apex Legends™: Audio Update
news.author: respawn_bean
news.contents: Apex has evolved so much since its initial launch, but something that has not changed is our intention for the sound of Apex: a balance of feedback, immersion, and emotion. Our primary focus is feedback, which delivers critical information to understand each situation, while immersion and emotion ar...

news.title: Dear diary, this Baldur's Gate 3 mod lets you write in-game journals documenting your characters' adventures
news.contents: What happened today? Well, Astarion said something sassy, Lae'zel tried to teach Gale how to build a shed, and Shadowheart wrote a Gauntlet of Shar-themed parody of 'Is This The Way To Amarillo'. That's about how I imagine the journal entries a new Baldur's Gate 3 mod lets you write as part of an im...

news.title: RPGs make up more than 30% of PC Gamer's Top 100, so clearly we've settled on a favourite genre
news.author: Fraser Brown
news.contents: Our annual Top 100 games list was published this week—a monumental undertaking that involved more than 30 writers and editors debating, discussing, pleading and even putting on presentations to sway colleagues. We are very tired. But that might also have something to do with the fact that we spend s...

news.title: The top 100 PC games
news.author: Phil Savage
news.contents: Welcome to the PC Gamer Top 100—our annual list of the best games you can play right now. For the last few months, the PC Gamer team has been busy whittling down the hundreds of thousands of games available on PC; campaigning, voting and arguing until we arrived at the 100 games you'll find below......

news.title: Veteran DnD designer bestows the ultimate praise on "fantastic" Baldur's Gate 3
news.author: editor@pcgamesn.com
news.contents: You don't need me to tell you that Baldur's Gate 3 is absolutely brilliant - Larian's trophy cabinet speaks for itself. At this point, the studio is likely used to the glowing praise, but hearing it from a Dungeons and Dragons veteran will feel particularly satisfying. In a new interview, Bruce Nesm...

news.title: Baldur's Gate 3 needed a "cowboy wizard extraordinaire" and its latest custom companion mod delivers
news.contents: Baldur's Gate 3 modders continue to dig deep into the bag of tools Larian gave them and unleash their creativity on mods which don't just remix existing bits of the game, but add entirely custom elements. While custom campaigns and new areas rightly grab a lot of the headlines, custom companions hav...

news.title: Rockstar's Agent was compromised because open worlds and spies don't mesh well, Ex-GTA writer Dan Houser says
news.contents: Cancelled Rockstar espionage flick Agent ended up being filed away without releasing because the studio found a spy narrative impossible to reconcile with their open-world approach to games, according to long-time GTA writer Dan Houser. Despite that, Rockstar subsequently ended up getting halfway up...

news.title: Claim a Free Benefactor Krieger Supercar in GTA Online
news.author: rockstarintl_steam
news.contents: Now through November 5, claim a free Benefactor Krieger (Super) in GTA Online and add this well-rounded hypercar to your vehicle collection. Just head into GTA Online and visit the Legendary Motorsport site, where the Krieger will be discounted from its regular GTA$2,875,000 price all the way down t...

news.title: GTA Online Halloween event calendar: UFO locations, ghost locations, and rewards
news.author: Diego Perez
news.contents: Grand Theft Auto Online's Halloween event is here for the year, and ghastly ghouls have taken over the streets of Los Santos yet again with new limited-time rewards. All the Halloween favorites from past years are returning, and there are new playlists and modes with boo-sted rewards in celebration ...

news.title: Celebrate Spooky Season as Halloween Haunts Los Santos
news.author: rockstarintl_steam
news.contents: Halloween descends on Southern San Andreas throughout October with a bubbling cauldron of chaos. There are reports of UFO sightings, bizarre transformations, and many more tricks and treats across GTA Online. Take on a new Slasher mode inside the claustrophobic Ramius submarine, or fight it out in r...

news.title: Secure the New Spy Shots Livery for the Överflöd Suzume
news.author: rockstarintl_steam
news.contents: Speed into the mainframe behind the wheel of the Överflöd Suzume, a Scandinavian supercar featured in the Money Fronts update that’s on sale for the first time ever this week (20% off) and wrapped in the new Spy Shots livery. Available with the Spy Shots livery at the Luxury Autos showroom and also ...

news.title: One of the most beloved Warhammer factions just arrived in Steam's biggest survival game, but they forgot their shovels
news.author: editor@pcgamesn.com
news.contents: Any Warhammer fan worth their salt will agree that the best weapon in the 41st millennium is the trusty shovel. You can dig trenches with them, bash an Ork over the head with them, or die in the Emperor's name while holding them. Wait, what's that? The shovels aren't coming? Well, that instantly put...

news.title: WARHAMMER 40,000 X RUST DLC PACK
news.author: Errn
news.contents: THE DEATH KORPS OF KRIEG - DLC SKINSThe infamous Death Korps of Krieg march into Rust, bringing their grim, war-forged resolve to the island.This pack delivers battle-scarred war gear, inspired by one of Warhammer 40,000’s most fearless regiments.Gear up and march across the island clad in their sig...

news.title: Rust developer is fed up with survivors cowering in their homes, so it's reworking progression to 'get players back out of their bases'
news.author: Rick Lane
news.contents: Having worked from home most of my adult life, I am familiar with the appeal of never having to leave my house. My commute to work is about ten steps long and I can do it in slippers if I like. I don't have to take out a second mortgage if I want a coffee or a slice of cake. Best of all, I don't hav...

news.title: New Rust update brings back blueprint fragments to solve "stale" progression
news.author: editor@pcgamesn.com
news.contents: Rust blueprint fragments are back, but not as you remember them. Developer Facepunch has just deployed its October Rust update, Meta Shift, and it's designed to overhaul everything from progression to loot drops and balance. It's continued to hold onto a spot as Steam's fifth most-popular title, bea...

news.title: META SHIFT
news.author: Errn
news.contents: BLUEPRINT FRAGMENTSThe current progression meta has grown stale, moving too fast and becoming too easy over the years, with scrap inflation and scrap being everywhere. We don't believe this has been overwhelmingly negative, but it has detracted from world PvP, especially in and around monuments, and...
